[#soil-segregation-size_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-segregation-size:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils segregations sizes codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils segregations sizes codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/ad49a3f1-bdac-54eb-9bb1-195d916a1db0[`Coarse (6-20mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/9df79b45-ff79-5edb-88ec-42d46726fa5b[`Extremely coarse (>60mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/ab182d26-786c-531b-b75b-fb1196af508e[`Fine (<2mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/6ad463af-c4ab-54dd-97cc-66a8988552a8[`Medium (2-6mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/ab824ecd-64ca-59bb-b86b-199eb0faedf0[`Not Applicable`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/83477cbd-57da-5a31-aa7f-43fbeb8f7d04[`Not Collected`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/ea37c94c-3a67-51e6-9b57-100f85bbc511[`Very coarse (20-60mm)`]
